title: Death rune

properties.name: description
properties.value: Death runes are one of the runes used to cast spells in the Magic skill. They are required to cast medium-level missile spells, like Wind Blast, Water Blast, Earth Blast, and Fire Blast. Members with 65 Runecraft and who have completed Mourning's End Part II can craft death runes at the Death Altar by using pure essence on it, with each essence yielding one death rune. Each death rune yields 10 Runecraft experience. Players with 99 Runecraft will always craft two death runes per essence. Crafting death runes from essence is a requirement for the Hard Ardougne Diary.

Death rune

Item ID560

Death runes are one of the runes used to cast spells in the Magic skill. They are required to cast medium-level missile spells, like Wind Blast, Water Blast, Earth Blast, and Fire Blast. Members with 65 Runecraft and who have completed Mourning's End Part II can craft death runes at the Death Altar by using pure essence on it, with each essence yielding one death rune. Each death rune yields 10 Runecraft experience. Players with 99 Runecraft will always craft two death runes per essence. Crafting death runes from essence is a requirement for the Hard Ardougne Diary.

Death runes can be bought from all Magic shops with a stock of 250, except for the Magic shop on Ape Atoll. Several monsters, such as ankous, nechryael, and dark beasts, commonly drop death runes. They can also be found in the Barrows Chest with at least 631[1] rewards potential.

Players can exchange a cat with the civilians in West Ardougne for 100 death runes, or 200 if they have completed the easy Ardougne diary. Kittens and lazy cats are not accepted, but overgrown cats are.

{{External|rs|rsc}} {{HasMMG|Crafting death runes through the Abyss}} {{Infobox Item |name = Death rune |image = [[File:Death rune.png]] |release = [[24 May]] [[2001]] |update = New magic system online! |members = No |quest = No |tradeable = Yes |placeholder = Yes |equipable = No |stackable = Yes |noteable = No |destroy = Drop |examine = Used for medium level missile spells. |value = 180 |weight = 0.000 |exchange = Yes |id = 560 |respawn=200}} [[File:Death rune detail.png|left|120px]] '''Death runes''' are one of the [[runes]] used to cast spells in the [[Magic]] skill. They are required to cast medium-level missile spells, like [[Wind Blast]], [[Water Blast]], [[Earth Blast]], and [[Fire Blast]]. Members with 65 [[Runecraft]] and who have completed [[Mourning's End Part II]] can craft death runes at the [[Death Altar]] by using [[pure essence]] on it, with each essence yielding one death rune. Each death rune yields 10 Runecraft experience. Players with 99 Runecraft will always craft two death runes per essence. Crafting death runes from essence is a requirement for the [[Hard Ardougne Diary]]. Death runes can be bought from all [[Magic shop]]s with a stock of 250, except for [[Tutab's Magical Market|the Magic shop on Ape Atoll]]. Several monsters, such as [[ankou]]s, [[nechryael]], and [[dark beast]]s, commonly drop death runes. They can also be found in the [[Barrows Chest]] with at least 631{{CiteTwitter|author=Mod Kieren|url=https://twitter.com/JagexKieren/status/705428283509366785|date=3 March 2016|archiveurl=https://archive.is/sB4lx|archivedate=2 September 2017|quote=You guys wanted info on Barrows loot, here it is... Full size: [http://i.imgur.com/oZSMkAX.png] Explained the best I can!}} rewards potential. Players can exchange a [[cat]] with the [[civilian]]s in [[West Ardougne]] for 100 death runes, or 200 if they have completed the easy [[Ardougne diary]]. [[Kitten]]s and [[lazy cat]]s are not accepted, but [[overgrown cat]]s are. ==Runecraft info== {{Tabber |tab1=Pure essence |tab1content={{Recipe |skill1 = Runecraft |skill1lvl = 65 |skill1boostable = yes |skill1exp = 10 |members = yes |ticks = 1 |facilities = Death Altar |tools = Death tiara, Death talisman |notes = [[Multiple runes|2 runes]] per essence after level 99. |mat1 = Pure essence |output1 = Death rune }} |tab2=Daeyalt essence |tab2content={{Recipe |skill1 = Runecraft |skill1lvl = 65 |skill1boostable = yes |skill1exp = 15 |members = yes |ticks = 1 |facilities = Death Altar |tools = Death tiara, Death talisman, Catalytic talisman, Catalytic tiara |notes = [[Multiple runes|2 runes]] per essence after level 99. |mat1 = Daeyalt essence |mat1cost = no |output1 = Death rune }} |tab3=Guardian essence |tab3content={{Recipe |skill1 = Runecraft |skill1lvl = 65 |skill1boostable = yes |skill1exp = |members = yes |ticks = 1 |facilities = Death Altar |notes = [[Multiple runes|2 runes]] per essence after level 99. |mat1 = Guardian essence |mat1itemnote = Accessible only in the [[Guardians of the Rift]] minigame. |mat1cost = no |output1 = Death rune }} }} {{Death Rune Spells}} ==Products== {{Uses material list|Death rune}} ==Item sources== {{Drop sources|Death rune}} ===Store locations=== {{Store locations list|Death rune}} ===Item spawns=== {{ItemSpawnTableHead}} {{ItemSpawnLine|name=Death rune|location=[[Feldip Hills]] -
